SENT.plain: We have analyzed Epstein-Barr viral DNA sequences in two cell lines HI-26-36 and HI-HFX
Glaser (1983), Virology 129, 199-206) concluded that these cells were transformed by virus that arose as the result of marker rescue of a transformation-incompetent deletion mutant of EBV
We compared viral DNA sequences in prototype EBV strains with data presented in the Virology paper
Our findings are not consistent with the data of Stoerker et al. and indicate that the cell lines supplied to us did not arise by "marker rescue" but appear to contain the Jijoye viral genome
